EmailTemplate.subject: Update on Narrow-Format Flight Deck Printers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear Customer: As previously communicated, we have signed a licensing agreement with a leading cockpit printer manufacturer, AstroNova, to manufacture and repair our model PTA-45B narrow-format flight deck printers. Below is additional information about the current aftermarket support structure for PTA-45B printers installed on Airbus platforms, specifically:
- A320 Single Aisle Family: Part Number 8055515-4501 - A300-600/A310 Wide Body Family: Part Number 8055515-4504
Place new spares orders (including aircraft on-ground) against Honeywell through the usual MyAerospace <http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com> channel.
For repair orders:
- All customers, except Chinese customers requiring AAC-038 tags, are expected to send their units to the AstroNova facility located in Rhode Island, USA at the following address:
Company Name:
AstroNova Inc.

600 Greenwich Avenue West Warwick, RI 02893 United States
Phone:
(401) 828-4000

Please share this information with others in your company. If you have questions or require additional information, please contact TCarll@astronovainc.com <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/qrXQ0G00qZ0Z0c02I00K000]]> or your Honeywell Customer Business Manager, Customer Business Director, or Customer Support Manager.
